header.value: Completely customized financial solution to meet your business needs

subheader.value: Fast and flexible custom financing solutions help you overcome your business challenges.

body.html:
Spring Funding Group understands how a loan at the right time can make a huge difference in the success of your business. To that end, we’ve made it fast and easy to access financing solutions completely designed around your small business needs.

We actively help small businesses just like yours with:

  • Merchant Cash Advance
  • Line of Credit
  • Equipment Financing
  • Mortgage Financing
  • Term Loands
  • Factoring
  • P.O Financing

Spring Funding Group offers merchant cash advances, small business loans, SBA loans, equipment financing, factoring, purchase order financing, lines of credit, and commercial mortgages nationwide.

Small businesses face big problems finding real solutions to streamline financial and marketing functions. A poor credit rating, expensive credit card processing, outdated payroll systems, or a nonexistent web presence can all negatively affect your growth.

Spring Funding Group and its team of dedicated service advisors will help identify, optimize, and deploy the right business solutions to meet your needs. Including:

  • Credit Servicing (Personal & Business)
  • HR and Payroll Services
  • Credit Card Processing
  • Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Web Development

Spring Funding Group offers personal and business credit servicing, credit card processing, payroll, website development, and SEO optimization.

header.value: Meet your Goals. Grow your Business.

subheader.value: Streamline financial and marketing systems to increase sales and improve the customer experience.

data.subheader: Alternative to lengthy approval processes and strict credit requirements for traditional term loans
data.note: A merchant cash advance (MCA) provides unsecured capital to small business owners on future credit card sales, providing small businesses an alternative to traditional bank loans. MCA quickly provides cash for businesses, allowing you to borrow against future earnings to access that capital today.
data.name: MCA
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

merchant-cash-advance.header: Unsecured working capital when your business needs it

data.name: Factor rate range: 15% – 49%; the advance is at a fixed rate, not an APR
Repayment can be made on either a Daily, Weekly, Bi-Weekly, or Monthly payment
Repayment terms rage from 30 days up to 24 months
Repayment can be made through ACH Debits or Credit Card Processing Holdbacks
Funds can be sent in as quick as one business day
Funding amounts range from $2,000 up to $2,000,000
Additional stipulations may be requested, such as: proof of ownership, financials (P&L and balance sheet), tax returns, accounts receivable reports
Do you have any existing debt on your balance sheet? If yes, what are the balances owed and who are the balances owed to?
How do you plan on using the funding?
How quickly do you need funding?
Even if your credit score is low or you have negative financial history or the business is less than one year old, there are still funding options with a merchant cash advance
We can consolidate existing merchant cash advances to lower payments and increase cash flow
This is a fast and convenient process with minimal paperwork and same-day funding available
When the balance is 50% paid, your business will be eligible for additional funding
Great option of any business that is grossing $10,000 in revenue per month and has been in business for at least 6 months

data.subheader: A flexible loan that you can access as needed to borrow up to a certain amount over time.
data.note: A line of credit allows you to borrow funds for planned and unexpected expenses with a low rate. The approval process is fast and requires minimal paperwork.
data.name: Line of Credit
data.note2: Call us to speak to a specialist today.

line-of-credit.header: Revolving line of credit for instant access to funds

data.name: A business making more than $20,000 with owner(s) FICO scores above a 600 is provided with a revolving Line of Credit (LOC) at low rates
LOC is paid on a consistent predetermined schedule (weekly or monthly)
More funds are available to draw as the principal is paid down
Approvals are extremely fast, and the credit limit can increase as long as there is a good repayment history
Application with basic details about the business and merchant
Do you have any existing debt on your balance sheet? If yes, what are the balances owed and who are the balances owed to?
Do you anticipate needing funding anytime in the next 12 months?
What do you intend to do with the funds from a line of credit?
Why not set up a line of credit now for a rainy day, as you won’t be paying anything until you draw from it?
Repayment can be made on a weekly or monthly basis
Great option for business owners with a 600+ FICO score and grossing at least $20,000 per month

data.subheader: Putting a lien on equipment in order to obtain financing.
data.note: A fast funding option with affordable interest rates enabling your business to replace, upgrade, or purchase the equipment necessary to keep your venture operating smoothly. Equipment financing can also serve as a type of asset-based financing, where the equipment itself is used to back up or secure the loan.
data.name: Equipment Financing
data.note2: Call us to speak to a specialist today.

data.name: A lien put on currently-owned equipment in order to obtain funds for any purpose
A lien put on equipment that you are looking to buy in order to obtain funds for its purchase
The equipment’s marketability (how easy it would be to sell)
Your ability to pay back the loan
Year to date bank statements and financials
Do you have any valuable equipment?
What is the age and condition of the equipment?
Are you looking to buy any valuable equipment?
Is the equipment semi-liquid and market ready?
Equipment financing is a fast and simple way to fund up to 100% of the value of the equipment
Use our tax calculator to help identify your savings, first-year depreciation, and deductions.

data.subheader: Get access to business financing by leveraging your property
data.note: Mortgage financing can help expand your business to additional or new real estate, fund capital improvements, or pursue new business and growth opportunities by taking advantage of the equity in your property.
data.name: Mortgage Financing
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

data.name: A lien is put on a currently-owned property in order to obtain funds for any purpose
A lien is put on a property that you are looking to buy in order to obtain funds for its purchase
The security and length of the loan
Property info: appraisal or broker’s opinion of value (BOV)
Personal financial statements – updated within last 60 days
Do you own any commercial property?
Are you looking to buy any commercial property?
Is the commercial property currently producing income?
Is there any debt on the property?
How many units are on the property?
Mortgage financing is only available for income-producing property
The most common way for a property to produce income is by having tenants
A property with both a business and a tenant on it is referred to as a mixed use property

data.subheader: A long-term loan that has a specified repayment schedule
data.note: A term loan gives you the cash to grow your business, whether it be to renovate office space or buying inventory. With a term loan, you borrow a lump of cash upfront for a specific purpose and repay the loan over a set period of time with fixed, equal payments.
data.name: Term Loan
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

term-loan.header: Long-term financing with terms that will position you for growth

data.name: A business with strong credit is provided with a long term loan at our lowest rates
Loan is paid off in monthly increments
Loan is paid off over a period of 1-5 years
Overall financial health/profitability of the businesses
2 most recent years of business tax returns + 1 year personal
Personal financial statements – updated within last 60 days (balance sheet and P&L for any deal over $800,000)
Are you currently receiving any term loan financing?
Have you successfully paid off any past term loans?
What do you intend to do with your term loan?
Getting funded for a term loan is a more time-consuming process, usually taking between 2-3 weeks for an approval
Term loans offer the most generous loan rate available
In the event that you do not qualify for a term loan we will pinpoint the reasons and provide a plan to build you up for an approval down the line

data.subheader: A business advance collateralized by your outstanding invoices
data.note: Invoice factoring is a way for small businesses to take out a loan against unpaid customer invoices to quickly unlock funds from pending invoices for operational expenses and growth opportunities.
data.name: Factoring
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

data.name: An invoice is a bill for goods or services already provided
A business sells its invoices to a third party (the factor) in order to meet its current obligations
The length of time until the invoice will be paid
Are you currently factoring any invoices?
Do you presently have a need for additional cash flow?
We only factor business to business transactions
Residual account; represents an ongoing relationship
With factoring you have the chance to get paid for your invoices right away – no need to wait

data.subheader: An advance collateralized by your business’ purchase orders
data.note: We provide working business capital based on your business' projected future sales. Businesses in high-risk industries, with financial problems or bad credit can be approved without any collateral.
data.name: P.O Financing
data.note2: Call us to speak to a loan specialist today.

data.name: Purchase orders are documents sent from a merchant to a provider with a request for an order
A business sells its purchase orders to a third party to obtain the funds necessary to satisfy the order
A list of unfulfilled purchase orders
Do you have any unfulfilled purchase orders?
Are you currently receiving purchase order financing?
Are you unable to make an initial payment for the order?
Purchase order financing is NOT a loan and therefore, you are not incurring any debt
The application required to establish a purchase order relationship is much simpler than other types of financing
With purchase order financing you can ONLY use the funds to assist with satisfying the order
Purchase order financing can support a single transaction and/or grow with your company’s funding requirements

data.name: Providing business owners with the ability to improve their credit
Allows you to qualify for better funding rates
Do you know what your credit score is?
Have you been declined for funding in the past because of bad credit?
The price of credit does not come close to what you will save on better funding rates

Pricing is determined on a case-by-case basis

data.subheader: Providing merchants with the ability to process credit card payments
data.note: Customers have come to expect businesses to accept at least some type of credit card and your small business would be at a disadvantage if it did not follow suit. With transactional, flat, and incidental fees, providing this service to your customers can be expensive. We can help.
data.name: Credit Card Processing
data.note2: Call us to speak to a specialist today.

data.name: Giving merchants the ability to process credit card payments affordably
We offer the best credit card processing rates on the market
Are you currently using credit card processing?
Do you do online credit card processing?
How much credit card processing do you do a month?
What are your current processing rates?
We work with small to Fortune 500-sized companies
We have a direct relationship with the credit card issuing bank. By cutting out all the middle men we provide the lowest rates available
We do a side-by-side comparison for you so you can see if switching to us makes more sense
We also offer ATM/debit card processing
Seamless terminal install with no interruption to your business
Credit card processing is not paid for out of pocket; you only pay for the service with a tiny fraction of your credit card sale

data.note: Many small businesses are held back by outdated payroll systems or time-consuming HR and employee benefit management. data.name: A comprehensive provider of business solutions that unite payroll, HR, tax, and benefits administration
Are you currently using any payroll service?
How much time do you spend on payroll?
How many employees are you managing?
Do you do your own taxes?
Are you currently maintaining detailed records of your payroll?
ADP is the largest small business payroll management service in the country and is safe (AA Rated)
Outsourcing payroll and HR management saves time and money and allows you to focus on what matters most
Process your client’s payroll anytime, anywhere on your phone
Instantly preview what cash is required before payroll is finalized, so there are no costly surprises

intro.header: Whatever your financial needs are - we got you covered
intro.content:
We provide working business capital based on your business’ projected future sales. Businesses in high-risk industries, with financial problems or bad credit, can be approved without any collateral.

If you are still not sure what solution is right for your company, that’s what we do. We analyze your financial and organizational situation and determine what financing options are right for you.

header.value: Completely customized financial solution to meet your business needs

subheader.value: Fast and flexible custom financing solutions help you overcome your business challenges.

content.subheader: An alternative to traditional bank loans

body.html:
Applying for a merchant cash advance (MCA) is a fast and convenient process with minimal paperwork and the opportunity for same-day funding availability. Funding amounts range from $2,000 to $2,000,000.

Rates are based on overall financial health, credit profile, time in business, average monthly revenue, and industry.

Applying for a merchant cash advance (MCA) is a fast and convenient process with minimal paperwork and the opportunity for same-day funding availability. Funding amounts range from $2,000 to $2,000,000.

Rates are based on overall financial health, credit profile, time in business, average monthly revenue, and industry.

header.value: Completely customized financial solution to meet your business needs

subheader.value: Fast and flexible custom financing solutions help you overcome your business challenges.

content.content:

Call us today at 646-933-8322or contact info@rockymountainfundinggroup.com
